channel.title: workshop on Fink broker
channel.description: Recent content in workshop on Fink broker

item.title: ozFink
item.description: Fink next workshop will be held on May 3 to 5 at Swinburne University of Technology, Melbourne, Australia. This workshop will develop collaboration across Australian research groups, observing facilities and the Fink collaboration. This meeting will be in hybrid format with participants both in person and on zoom. More information at https://www.ozgrav.org/ozfink-workshop-2023.html.

item.title: LSST enabling science 2020 broker workshop
item.description: In order to enable new science with the LSST alert stream, brokers are developing a new layer in the time domain ecosystem, experimenting with new ways of enriching and filtering these data. A diversity of solutions are being tested, but there is a need for more interaction between brokers, their community of users, and the alert generation teams.

item.title: First Fink Workshop @ IJCLab
item.description: The First Fink Workshop will take place at IJCLab on the 6 February 2020, just after the LSST-France meeting.
